main event: A stationary object was observed at Maxwell AFB, Alabama on 11 August 1954, which changed colors and then faded away.
interesting points: The object was initially seen as a stationary star, then changed colors from red to bright orange, and back to white before disappearing., The sighting lasted for 15 minutes., The object was analyzed through ground and radar observations., The object made no maneuvers during the sighting., Possible explanations included aircraft, balloons, or astronomical phenomena with insufficient data for a solid conclusion.
witness description: Airdrome officer, driver, and tower operators at Maxwell AFB
